at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand
at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker if the player can't they lose n life
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals x damage to that player where x is the number of infection counters on cardname
at the beginning of each upkeep if enchanted creature is untapped tap it
at the beginning of your upkeep each player reveals the top card of their library if all cards revealed this way are creature cards put those cards onto the battlefield under their owners' control
at the beginning of each upkeep untap all creatures and lands
at the beginning of each upkeep if you had another creature enter the battlefield under your control last turn draw a card
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller cardname deals n damage to that player

at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player may pay any amount of mana cardname deals n damage to that player prevent x of that damage where x is the amount of mana that player paid this way
at the beginning of your upkeep untap enchanted land you gain control of that land until end of turn
at the beginning of your upkeep enchanted creature deals n damage to its owner

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player creates a n n basecolor elemental creature token named lightning rager it has trample haste and at the beginning of the end step sacrifice this creature

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses artifact creature land or nonminus aura enchantment all nontoken permanents of that type phase out while they're phased out they're treated as though they don't exist each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step
at the beginning of each player's upkeep destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice it can't be regenerated

at the beginning of each upkeep you may exile target creature card from your graveyard if you do create a token that's a copy of that card except it's a spirit in addition to its other types exile it at the beginning of the next end step

at the beginning of each opponent's upkeep that player reveals the top card of their library if it's a creature card the player puts the card into their graveyard and cardname becomes a copy of that card if it does it loses this ability
at the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller that player loses n life
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player may sacrifice a creature if that player doesn't they lose n life and you sacrifice cardname

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses target player whose graveyard has fewer creature cards in it than their graveyard does and is their opponent the first player may return a creature card from their graveyard to their hand
at the beginning of each upkeep tap enchanted creature
genericmana tap enchanted creature
specialmana tap enchanted creature
